dataset_id: NACP: Urban Greenhouse Gases across the CO2 Urban Synthesis and Analysis Network
title: NACP: Urban Greenhouse Gases across the CO2 Urban Synthesis and Analysis Network
summary: This dataset provides hourly urban greenhouse gas measurements for cities in the CO2 Urban Synthesis and Analysis (CO2-USA) Data Synthesis Network. Measurements include carbon dioxide (CO2), methane (CH4), and carbon monoxide (CO) concentrations measured at hourly intervals at multiple sites within the cities of Boston, Indianapolis, Los Angeles, Portland, Salt Lake City, and San Francisco.
